sections: This incredible car was one of the greatest cars of its time and now it's ready for a new owner.

was no doubt created in the time of the third generation Porsche 911. While the exterior styling may not have changed much from the original first-gen, the car significantly improved performance and handling. The 1990s were a great time for cars worldwide as many of the incredible high-performance machines were starting to recover from a rough patch in the 1980s. Finally, those machines had gotten their pride back, and Porsche took the opportunity to make something, unlike anything the international automotive world had ever seen.
is the epitome of ‘90s performance, and it could soon be yours.

is a pristine model with more than enough performance attributes for any classic European car enthusiast with a taste for speed. Sitting behind the rear axle of this potent Porsche sports car is a 3.3-liter flat-six engine. That incredible engine utilizes a massive turbocharger to produce 315 horsepower and 332 ft/lbs of torque which is an astonishing figure for a car that weighs 3,274lbs. The driving experience of this insane vehicle can only be described in one word, raw. Without a doubt, this was a totally intentional feature as the Porsche design team has been specializing in tight handling and high power for decades.

is transferred through a five-speed manual transaxle which further extends the incredible ferocity of this vehicle. Despite the incredibly violent acceleration and viscous cornering ability, the gearbox can still deliver a smoother ride for low-performance situations such as daily driving. However, if you intend to use this car for what it was made to do, track racing, then the limited-slip differential will suit you quite nicely as you drift through turns and straits like butter on a hot pan. This car is the perfect combination of style, performance, and drivability, making it something you should definitely consider buying soon!

presents cars in an unparalleled fashion, with a comprehensive history, descriptions, photos, and video for each vehicle. We want to put buyers in the virtual driver’s seat so they can experience a vehicle as if they were present, giving them confidence in their purchase.
